descriptionHtml:
[img] http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/11010-2-1333473907.jpg [/img]

[color=#4ea2e5] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[b] [color=#4ea2e5] Psychosteve's SkyUI icon Set [/color][/b] [b] | V 0.9.3 [/b]
[color=#4ea2e5] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]


[b] [color=#e0530d]WARNING : SkyUI 3.0 is finally out !!! The 1.0 final version of my icon set is already
integrated on it so you don't need to download / install this mod (0.9.3)...
However, there is still plenty of work to do with the SkyUI team to improve and make
some more icons... So stay tuned for more updates on this page from time to time !
[/color] [/b]

[b] [color=#fbaf37]AT LAST...the v 0.9.3 of this mod is finally out with more icons !

For now only the basic set of icons is available on display (SkyUI 2.1 and 2.2 users).

The complete pack will be automaticly updated with the next SkyUI update.

If you want to test the BETA release of the SkyUI 2.2.1 (with all icons) please contact

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=4037238 target="_blank"] MisterPete[/url] by sending him personnal messages.
[/color] [/b]


Here is a icon replacer for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3863 target="_blank"] SkyUI 2.2[/url].

This mod is a [color=#ffe292]WORK IN PROGRESS[/color] and will be updated as soon as possible.

All icons in white color are available for now (see the pictures for more info).

The icons ingame are resized and losing quality due to SkyUI flash file (resizing font & icons).

I will try to fix the resizing to get a 100% icon size for best quality.

Stay tuned & Enjoy !!




[b] [color=#fbaf37] What's in the box ?? [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[list]
[*] new icons for items menu

[*] new icons for magic menu

[*] new icons for inventory items

[*] [b] [color=#fbaf37] new icons for mods and DLC [/color] [/b]
[/list]



[b] [color=#fbaf37] Install [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[list]
[*] Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3863 target="_blank"] SkyUI[/url] with [color=#ffe292]small icon size[/color] (for better quality)

[*] Use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager/ target="_blank"] Nexus Mod Manager[/url]

[b] [color=#fbaf37]OR[/color] [/b]

[*] Manually unzip the files in your [color=#ffe292]Data/interface/skyui/[/color] folder

[*] replace files
[/list]



[b][color=#fbaf37]Uninstall[/color][/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[list]
[*] Use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager/ target="_blank"] Nexus Mod Manager[/url]

[b] [color=#fbaf37]OR[/color] [/b]

[*] Manually delete the files in your [color=#ffe292]Data/interface/[/color] folder

[b] [color=#fbaf37]OR[/color] [/b]

[*] Re-install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3863 target="_blank"] SkyUI[/url] to default
[/list]



[b][color=#fbaf37]Credits[/color][/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[list]
[*] Thanks to the SkyUI team for the original mod : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3863 target="_blank"] SkyUI[/url]

[*] Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=4037238 target="_blank"] MisterPete[/url] for his help
[/list]



[b] [color=#fbaf37] Want more ? [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]


Don't forget to check out my other mods :

[list]

[*] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6538 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Golden God's Shrines [/url]

[*] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4640 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Stone of Barenziah [/url]

[*] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5763 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Bust of the Gray Fox [/url]

[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9868 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Custom Realistic Lighting [/url]

[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7699 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Horse Whistle sound [/url]
[/list]
author: Psychosteve
